metadata.text1:
Get IV access & if possible perform sepsis screen

Sepsis screen: FBC, CRP, Blood culture +/- Lumbar Puncture

Perform cultures PRIOR to giving antibiotics if possible

REMEMBER TO WRITE NEOTREE NUMBER ON BLOOD CULTURE BOTTLE (last 3 and first 3 digits of full number)
metadata.text2:
Start antibiotics:
- Penicillin 50,000 iu/kg 12 hrly IV/IM and 
- Gentamicin 4 or 5 mg/kg/dose 24hrly IV/IM (<2000g/>2000g)  

Length of antibiotics: 
Stop at 48 hours if investigations/cultures negative AND baby well
If clinically unwell, give at least 5 days
,
Give 14-21 days with high suspicion of meningitis or positive CSF culture result

If GBS positive CSF result treat for 14 days
If E.coli or Klebsiella give 21 days

Change frequency of Penicillin to 6 hrly if > 7days age
metadata.text3:
Check blood sugar and provide feeding support if needed

Give 2.5 mL/kg 10% dextrose bolus if blood glucose <2.6 and baby symptomatic

Give 10mL/kg fluid bolus if shocked

Thermoregulation: aim for body temperature between 36.5 - 37.5

If baby has fever (T = 38.5) remove from warmer and unwrap 

Provide respiratory support as needed
